title: From the ashes
creator_credit: International Women's Film Project Productions, Glenn Silber and Helena Solberg Ladd
brief_description: A documentary tracing the history of Nicaragua from the presence of U.S. Marines in the early 1900s, through several rebellions to the problems of the present (up to 1981). The film focuses on the present efforts of the people to rebuild their country. Includes interviews.
creator_credit_for_label: International Women’s Film Project Productions, Glenn Silber and Helena Solberg Ladd
